original_text: Because I was confident of this, I wanted to visit you first so that you might benefit twice.
korean_text: 내가 이 확신을 가지고 너희로 두 번 은혜를 얻게 하기 위하여 먼저 너희에게 이르렀다가

sentences.original_text: Because I was confident of this
I wanted to visit you first
so that you might benefit twice
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 당신이 두 번 유익을 받을 수 있도록
